thread.title: Stories of women imprisoned by the Syrian government | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Stories of women imprisoned by the Syrian government | Daily Mail Online

author: Kelly Mclaughlin For Mailonline
title: Stories of women imprisoned by the Syrian government | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad 'He tied a piece of cloth around my hair and hung me from a tube attached to the wall': Horrific stories of women imprisoned by the Syrian government who are raped and tortured so often that guards pass out birth control pills The full extent of the crimes against women in Syrian prisons was revealed in a report by the London School of Economics Each day, women are dragged from their cells to be tortured and raped Violence is systematic and so frequent that guards pass out contraceptive pills The Syrian regime denies normalizing rape and abuse as a way of interrogation procedure and punishment for men and women in its prisons
